trans-unit.source: Provides workflow compilation options for the current compilation or validation task.
This class can only be created on a scope basis, using the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.WorkflowCompilationContext.CreateScope%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別只能使用 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.WorkflowCompilationContext.CreateScope%2A> 方法，以範圍為基礎加以建立。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether <see cref="P:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.IWorkflowCompilerOptionsService.CheckTypes" /> is enabled at the current scope.
<see langword="true" /> if <see cref="P:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.IWorkflowCompilerOptionsService.CheckTypes" /> is enabled; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果啟用 <see langword="true" />，則為 <see cref="P:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.IWorkflowCompilerOptionsService.CheckTypes" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.IWorkflowCompilerOptionsService.CheckTypes%2A> indicates whether the types in the workflow being compiled are checked against a list that allows or excludes types based on the value of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.AuthorizedType.Authorized%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.IWorkflowCompilerOptionsService.CheckTypes%2A> 會指出正在編譯之工作流程中的型別，是否已針對根據 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.AuthorizedType.Authorized%2A> 屬性的值允許或排除型別的清單進行檢查。

trans-unit.source: The workflow compiler options for the current scope.
Initializes a <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.WorkflowCompilationContext" /> class at the current scope.

The `serviceProvider` parameter is the general property bag for the scope; if it contains an <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.IWorkflowCompilerOptionsService> the context is set according to that service.
trans-unit.target: `serviceProvider` 參數是範圍的一般屬性包，如果其中包含 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.IWorkflowCompilerOptionsService>，就會根據該服務設定內容。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.WorkflowCompilationContext" /> that is available at the current scope.
The workflow compilation context that is available at the current scope, or <see langword="null" /> if no compilation scope is initialized.
trans-unit.target: 目前的範圍，在工作流程編譯內容或<see langword="null" />如果沒有編譯範圍已經初始化。

trans-unit.source: Returns a list of types that the compiler allows in compiled workflows.
A list of types that the compiler allows in compiled workflows.
Gets the workflow compiler options <see cref="P:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.IWorkflowCompilerOptionsService.Language" /> that is available at the current scope.
The workflow compiler options programming language that is available at the current scope.
trans-unit.target: 取得目前範圍可用的工作流程編譯器選項程式設計語言。

trans-unit.source: Gets the workflow compiler options <see cref="P:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.IWorkflowCompilerOptionsService.RootNamespace" /> that is available at the current scope.
The workflow compiler options root namespace that is available at the current scope.
trans-unit.target: 目前範圍可用的工作流程編譯器選項根命名空間。
